webwork-tex.statement:
Find the partial derivatives indicated. Assume the variables are restricted to a domain on which the function is defined. \[f(x,y) = x^{5}+7x^{5}y.\]
\(f_x(1,3) =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{17.5ex}{\hrulefill}} \leavevmode\\\relax \(f_y(1,3) =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{17.5ex}{\hrulefill}}
webwork-tex.solution:
\par \par {\bf Solution: }\par SOLUTION \par
We have \[f_x(x,y) = 5x^{4}+7\cdot 5x^{4}y\quad \mbox{ and }\quad f_y(x,y) = 7x^{5},\] so \[f_x(1,3) = 110\quad \mbox{ and }\quad f_y(1,3) = 7.\]
\par
